pages.body:
# List of Zites: Discussion | [[zite-list-chat|Chat]]

### Zites that provide visitors with a means of social networking can be considered a discussion site.

* [ZeroTalk](/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/).  (English)  
Similar to Reddit, ZeroTalk is the original release of a social platform. The zite operates in a decentralized forum fashion containing topics and subtopics. Visitors who have registered with a [[ZeroID]] are able to post comments and replies. Visitors can edit or delete their own comment by clicking the small pencil icon found the to left of their post body and subject title.
    * Zite Address: 1TaLkFrMwvbNsooF4ioKAY9EuxTBTjipT  
    * Zite Discussion: 0List, ZeroCentral, ZeroTalk  
    * Zite Domain: Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit  
    * Zite Language: English, Various

* [ZeroTalk EO](/1YwB6u3f9TUfre8H9scXkbPyeuMaJSJio/) - ZeroTalk en Esperanto

* [0chan](/0chan.bit/) - P2P imageboard

* [ZeroTalk Tech](/1EfLnw7GDXbZfJmGNoXGQ4XkuHGWkRZTMq/) - Talk about Anything having to do with Technology

* [ZeroBoard](/Board.ZeroNetwork.bit/) - Very basic microblogging

* [ZeroVoat](/1J1c7eML6uMwDU4uiKbKRxoqxGP6WMFMvb/) - Reddit/Voat clone

# Proxies

A proxy is a website that you can reach using any web-capable device that runs a multi-user [[ZeroNet]] instance. *[Learn how to host one](/kindlyfire.bit/?Post:9:Running+a+ZeroProxy)*. You can also install [[AWS Shadow Socks]].

There also is a website dedicated to listing proxies: [zeroproxies.bit](/zeroproxies.bit), but it is outdated.

## List of working proxies (they die fast)

- https://bit.surf:43110/ (replacing https://bit.no.com:43110/)
- https://www.zerogate.tk/ (Adding new sites is disabled)
- https://proxy.th3nd.com/
- https://zeronet.maxweiss.io/
- https://alilialili.ga/
- https://fuckcf.cf/ ((Qualys SSL Labs grade A+) + HSTS Preload, TLS 1.3 or QUIC)
- https://zn.maly.io/
- https://zeroml.ml/ (Can also proxy Freenet)
- http://cvhb5yx2qdclb76m.onion/ (Onion, only usable over [[Tor]])

## List of meta proxies

What's meta proxy? See [this post](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1_1M4Ab8CUu3byziHVvNXLHmPezC4Lg9hvNJ)

- https://zero.acelewis.com/
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1KSAMg1UFuUa17do6uSBni5jpNt9wsYrP6
